meanings.definition: The act of observing the sky for celestial objects or phenomena.
meanings.sent1: Skywatching is fun on clear nights when you can see the stars twinkling above.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy skywatching to spot shooting stars and planets in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: During our skywatching session, we thought we saw a UFO, but it was just a passing airplane.
meanings.sent4: His passion for skywatching is like a treasure hunt in the vast expanse of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of skywatching lies in the peacefulness of gazing up at the stars.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in the activity of watching the sky.
meanings.sent1: The skywatching group meets every weekend to explore the wonders of the night sky together.
meanings.sent2: As a dedicated skywatching enthusiast, she always carries her telescope for stargazing.
meanings.sent3: The little boy declared himself the official skywatching expert of the family.
meanings.sent4: She is a true skywatching aficionado, always eager to share her knowledge with others.
meanings.sent5: The skywatching club welcomed new members who shared a passion for astronomy.
